Translations.Text: He manara! Tomalokehe allahara mukhapeksi; arau allaha, teraemi abharamukta, prasansita
Te'om iccha karaile tomalokaka apasaraita karaiba parae arau eta natuna srsti lai ahiba parae
Arau seya allahara babe eko tana kama nahaya

Arau kono bahanakaraiye anara boja bahana nakaraiba, arau konoba bharaakraanta byaktiye yadi tara boja bahanara babe karaobaka mate tathapi'o tara bojara kono ansa'i bahana karaa naha’ba anaki tara nikata atmiya ha’le'o nakaraiba. Tumi kerala te'omlokakahe satarka karaiba paraiba yisakale nija pratipalakaka nedekhakaiye bhaya karae arau chalata kayema karae. Yiye nijake paraisud'dhi karae, si nijara kalyanara babe'i paraisud'dhi karae. Pratyarartana kerala allahara phale'i
Andha arau drstisampanna byakti ketiya'o samana nahaya
sitala cham arau prakhara ra’do samana nahaya
arau samana nahaya jiraita arau mrtasakala. Niscaya allahe yaka iccha karae sunaya, kintu yisakala byakti kabarata ache tumi sihamtaka ketiya'o sunaba noraaraiba
Niscaya ami tomaka satyasaha praerana karaicho susambadadata arau satarkakarairaupe; arau ene kono jati na'i yara ocarata satarkakarai aha na'i

Arau sihamte yadi tomaka abisbasa karae tente (jani thoraa) sihamtara purbarartisakale'o abisbasa karaichila, sihamtara ocarata sihamtara raachulasakala suspasta pramanadi, granthadi arau diptimana kitabasaha ahichila
Tara pichata yisakale kupharai karaichila ami sihamtaka sasti bihichilo. Eteke (coraa) kenekuraa achila mora pratyakhyana (sasti)
